alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 10:30AM CDT until June 04 at 8:13AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. .With rainfall anticipated over the next 24 hours, additional rises in river levels are expected along the Maple River. The river is expected to crest within Minor flood stage by midweek before beginning to fall back toward Action stage by late week. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94). * WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Flooding begins on high ground near gage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Monday the stage was 14.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 19.8 feet Wednesday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
